# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Original Stone Furnace at position(43.0, -82.0)

- Stone Furnace (position 43.0, -82.0)

### New Stone Furnace at position(45.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace (position 45.0, -82.0)

### Burner Mining Drill at position(40.0, -84.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill (position 40.0, -84.0)

### Wooden Chest at position(39.5, -85.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden Chest (position 39.5, -85.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to fuel depletion
- Regularly check the fuel status of entities like Burner Mining Drills and replenish fuel as necessary to avoid them running out of fuel.
